sparkling_gift.name: Sparkling Gesture
sparkling_gift.summary: Find a glittering keepsake that Alicia can gift to Laura.
sparkling_gift.description: Alicia wants to surprise Laura with a shimmering token. She believes a rare teardrop crystal from the lower tunnels would be perfect.
objectives: Locate a Glittering Teardrop in the dungeon.
Return it to Alicia so she can craft a gift for Laura.

golden_promise.name: Golden Promise
golden_promise.summary: Secure an ornate ring so Laura can work with new material.
golden_promise.description: Laura needs an unmarked golden band taken from a rare undead. She is willing to pay well for anyone brave enough to retrieve it.
objectives: Acquire an Untarnished Signet from the depths.
Deliver the ring to Laura at her forge.

silent_shipment.name: The Silent Shipment
silent_shipment.description: The Gate Guard is worried about a shipment that never arrived. He suspects someone in town might know more.
objectives: Ask around town about the shipment.
Speak to Alicia about any strange sightings.
Return to the Gate Guard with your findings.

void_venom.name: Void Venom
void_venom.summary: Collect Void Stingers for antidote research.
void_venom.description: The Guard has reported attacks by Void Wasps. We need their stingers to develop an antidote.
objectives: Hunt Void Wasps on deeper floors.
Return them to the Gate Guard.

crystal_light.name: Crystal Light
crystal_light.summary: Retrieve a Crystal Core for Alicia's lamp.
crystal_light.description: Alicia's shop lamp is fading. She needs a core from a Crystalline Golem to reignite it.

lost_knowledge.name: Lost Knowledge
lost_knowledge.summary: Recover a Grimoire Page for the Scholar.
lost_knowledge.description: A scholar in the pub believes the Void Casters possess torn pages of an ancient history.

fallen_hero.name: A Fallen Hero
fallen_hero.summary: Retrieve a Broken Badge from a Lost Paladin.
fallen_hero.description: The Scholar wants to identify a paladin who went missing years ago. His badge should still be on his reanimated corpse.
objectives: Find a Lost Paladin in the deep dungeon.

shadow_hunt.name: Shadow Hunt
shadow_hunt.summary: Collect Shadow Essence for the Mystic.
shadow_hunt.description: A strange Mystic in the temple seeks the essence of pure shadow to study the Void.

cursed_blade.name: Cursed Blade
cursed_blade.summary: Find a Rusted Blade for Laura to restore.
cursed_blade.description: Laura believes she can restore an ancient blade if you can find one on the skeletal warriors.
objectives: Find a Rusted Blade from Skeletons.

mana_gathering.name: The Source of Magic
mana_gathering.description: Alicia wants to study the raw form of magic found in Wisps.

rare_delicacy.name: Rare Delicacy
rare_delicacy.summary: Get a Bat Wing for the Gambler.
rare_delicacy.description: The Gambler claims roasted Bat Wing is a delicacy. Or maybe he just lost a bet.

gold_rush.name: Gold Rush
gold_rush.summary: Find a Gold Tooth for the Gambler.
gold_rush.description: The Gambler heard Ghouls sometimes have gold teeth. He wants one.

divine_protection.name: Divine Protection
divine_protection.description: The Mystic needs a feather from an Angel to create a ward against the Void.

demonic_pact.name: Demonic Pact
demonic_pact.description: The Scholar wants to study the physical composition of demons.

final_seal.name: The Final Seal
final_seal.summary: Destroy the Lich and bring its skull.
final_seal.description: The Lich in the deep crypts is anchoring the Void to this world. Destroy it.
objectives: Bring the Lich Skull to the Mystic.
